```{r, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}

library(outbreaks)
library(tidyverse)

library(rstan)
library(gridExtra)
rstan_options (auto_write = TRUE)
options (mc.cores = parallel::detectCores ())


library(tidybayes)
library(gridExtra)

library(rmarkdown)

```

```{r,echo = FALSE}

data <- read.csv("owid-covid-data.csv")

data <- data %>%
    filter(iso_code == "BRA") %>% 
    select(date,
           new_cases) %>%
    arrange(desc(date))

paged_table(data)

```

```{r,echo = FALSE ,warning=FALSE}


data %>%
    filter( !is.na(data) ) %>% 
    ggplot() + 
    geom_bar(mapping = aes(x = date, y = new_cases), fill = "steelblue" , color = "steelblue", stat = "identity") +
    labs(y = "n√∫mero de casos reportados", x = "dia")


```
